channel.title: Websense on Bala Subramanyam Lanka
channel.description: Recent content in Websense on Bala Subramanyam Lanka

item.title: Categorising a website in Websense / Forcepoint
item.description: When we own a website, we have to make sure that our website is accessible from all the systems without any sort of proxy blocking. I work in a software organization, which uses Websense/Forcepoint, a security solution for the organization’s network.
